titles.title: A joint resolution designating El Paseo de las Flores Pedestrian Promenade and Hispanic Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Los Angeles, California, as the "Hispanic Vietnam Veterans National Memorial".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 9/20/1988--Introduced. Designates the site known as El Paseo de las Flores Pedestrian Promenade and Hispanic Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Los Angeles, California, as a national memorial to Hispanic Americans who served in the Vietnam conflict. Declares that the memorial shall be known as the Hispanic Vietnam Veterans National Memorial.
